name: sugar-daddy-platform
description: Sugar Daddy/Sugar Baby Platform - Microservices Architecture

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend/web-app" "npm run dev --prefix backend/api-gateway"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend/web-app && npm run build --prefix backend/api-gateway
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix frontend/web-app && npm run test --prefix backend/api-gateway
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf frontend/*/node_modules && rm -rf backend/*/node_modules && rm -rf ai-ml/*/node_modules
